detectors.description:
UnilayerStake.withdraw(uint256,UnilayerStake.WithdrawType) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UnilayerStake.sol#201-238) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rate = holder.amountLocked.mul(CAP).div(stake.unilayerLocked) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UnilayerStake.sol#209)
	-reward_temp = stake.rewardPayment.mul(rate).div(CAP).sub(holder.reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UnilayerStake.sol#211)
